page.title: 12Trade_Milkman
page.content: Mr.P.Baldry. Age 21. 10 Hungate Lane, Hunmanby. Tel. 890948 {Milk.}The milk comes from Associated Cooperative Creameries,Whitby.The milk is sent on a wagon one day in advance. The milk arrives at the fridge between 9:00a.m and 12:00 noon. {Delivery Round.}Mr.Baldry gets up about 5:00a.m in winter and about 4:30a.m in the summer.He starts his round about 5:15a.m and finishes between 11:00a.m and 12:00 noon. Mr.Baldry delivers milk to half of Hunmanby and the whole of Hunmanby Gap.He has about 400 customers and delivers about 3500 pints a week. He uses about 12 gallons of petrol a week.
